page.title: 01 THE EASTERN AREA
page.content: My name is Therese.Thank you for selecting our area. I live in part of the eastern development of Northampton known as Thorplands. It is fairly new. There is a big shopping precinct called Tesco's in the Weston Favell Centre, close to where I live. Near the Centre is a church called the "Sacred Heart" which is shaped like a pyramid. The priests live downstairs. There is also a community hall and a large upper school for pupils aged between 13 and 18 years. Part of that school is known as Lings forum which is a community sports and recreational centre. Not far from where I live is Billing Aquadrome. Here there is a big fair with lots of rides and things to do. Recently, they have built a large swimming pool.I like where I live.
